signals: New legal clause added for Haynes Foods budget shift
Storyboard automation pilot unlocked for Lumen Fitness project

projects.name: Haynes Beans Launch
projects.overview: Launching high-fibre baked beans to health-conscious Gen Z and Millennial parents. Budget shift requires cascading updates across brief, concepts, and script.
aiHighlights: AI flagged persona mismatch after budget change and queued regeneration.
Creative Director AI suggested tone pivot away from hard sci-fi in Concept Aurora.
Script Assistant auto-tagged production notes affected by the new inflation clause.

timeline.headline: Keeping two territories fresh while tone pivots

phases.title: Generate & Develop Territories

aiThread.content: Generate six concept loglines using updated personas and tone descriptors.
Produced six territories. Aurora and Hearthlight scored highest against the brief.
Expand Concept Aurora into a one-page narrative with three key visual moments.
Narrative drafted. Tone skews sci-fi—recommend alternate setting to match persona motivations.

feedbackFeed.note: Love the humour, but let's keep the world grounded. No astronaut suits.
Persona motivation emphasises family mealtime ease—lean into communal moments.

timeline.headline: Preparing v0.7 with backyard hero beat

feedbackFeed.note: Tone reads warm but we still reference moon dust once—swap before client sees it.

loops.name: Budget Ripple Loop

Adjust Concept Aurora setting to reduce VFX costs.
Add production notes for practical effects in script scene 2.

actions: Swap moon reveal for family backyard moment.

Update script hero beat to match new visual cues.

feedbackStream.summary: Budget capped at $350k. Prioritize deliverables and adjust tone to feel grounded.
Hearthlight resonance high; keep comedic warmth consistent across script.

futureFeedback.summary: Client to confirm preference for 'family backyard' storyboard. Expect request for alt taglines.
